bibl.title: Letter from Henry Rose Carter to Hugh S. Cumming, June 10, 1920

div1.p: Carter returns unused government travel vouchers.

div1.head: Letter from Henry Rose Carter to Hugh S. Cumming, June 10, 1920
div1.opener:
Returning Government
Transportation Requests.
H. R. Carter,
Assistant Surgeon General.
/LC
Baltimore, Md.,
June 10, 1920.
Surgeon General,
U. S. Public Health Service,
Washington, D. C.
Sir:
div1.p:
I have the honor to return herewith the unused portion of
Government Requests for Transportation---book T-141686 to T-141690.
